abstract: A research note issued by Citigroup on Tuesday said 70 percent of Netflix’s return mailers must be sorted by hand.
snippet: A research note issued by Citigroup on Tuesday said 70 percent of Netflix’s return mailers must be sorted by hand.
lead_paragraph: When Netflix’s seven million subscribers send their DVDs back to one of the rental service’s 47 distribution centers, the discs do not represent many happy returns for the Postal Service.

headline.main: Post Office Drawback Cited in Dark Forecast for Netflix
headline.print_headline: Post Office Drawback Cited In Dark Forecast for Netflix
